scripts.build:dev: rm -rf build && webpack --config webpack.dev.js && cp -r static/. build/unpacked && find build -name '.DS_Store' -type f -delete
scripts.build:prod: rm -rf build && webpack --config webpack.prod.js && cp -r static/. build/unpacked && find build -name '.DS_Store' -type f -delete && cd build/unpacked && zip -r ../packed.zip .
